From 4 - 8 years of hands-on experience in using Java to design and develop applications.
Upper-intermediate English is a must, including 4 skills: reading, writing, speaking and listening (able to work in English-speaking environment).
Knowledge of popular DBMS such as MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL or NoSQL.
Experience working with Git and SVN.

Về chúng tôi
DaouKiwoom Group has been one of the leading companies in Korea's IT and financial services with the total revenue of 2.2billion USD, profit of 1 billion USD and more than 5,000 employees in 2020.
We started as the 1st generation IT ventures, DAOU Tech in 1986, and successfully expanded into finance industry in 2000 through Kiwoom securities, No.1 Securities company in Korea.
So now as a group with a good balance of IT and finance, it is operating in Korea, Japan, China, France, Indonesia and Vietnam.
DaouKiwoom Innovation was founded in 2018 in order to bring various business activities in Vietnam with great experiences and capability of the best IT service in Korea.
In 2021, we are setting up our own R&D center to support our IT development projects from our subsidiaries in Korea. In our R&D business plan, we are focusing on projects related to the group's financial business as IT outsourcing business and development of our own platform in Vietnam by ourselves.

quy_trinh_phong_van: ['Vòng 1: Phỏng vấn với Technical Team', 'Vòng 2: Phỏng vấn với Technical Director', 'Vòng 3: Phỏng vấn với HR']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
ABOUT US
Floware is a leader in building innovative software to transform the way people live, play, work, and learn. Our mission is to create smart solutions that benefit everyone and solve their daily challenges. We were the first in Vietnam to develop an iOS app and our first OS X application SmartDay debuted on the Mac App Store at #5.
Location: Ho Van Hue Street, Phu Nhuan District, HCMC
Office hour: Monday – Friday (8:30 AM – 5:30 PM)
Trách nhiệm công việc
Work closely with the development team (Backend, Frontend, DevOps, R&D, Technical Director, PM) to collaborate, understand the product requirements and knowledge clearly and accurately.
Perform testing phases including Dev, QA, and Staging environments.
Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts for API testing using the Postman tool with an existing Python framework.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand API specifications and design efficient and comprehensive test cases.
Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts for Functional and Sync UI testing for crossed-platforms (Mac, Web, iPhone, iPad) using the existing Python framework. Integrate automated tests into the CI/CD nightly pipeline and the instant execution for efficient testing processes.
Monitor and analyze test results, investigate failures, and provide feedback to the development team.
Report daily to the Team Leader and Technical Director about problems/issues/risks at the Backend side.
Document working efforts on Confluence to provide feedback, evidence, and a further improvement in the team.
Take the main responsibility for your own assignment and provide improvements for the product quality.
Participate in client meetings to discuss and agree on the automation testing approach and follow it up in new automation test opportunities. 
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
At least 2 years in automation testing and ensuring product quality.
Hands-on experience with a programming language such as Python.
Experience in API automation testing (Python, Java, JMeter, Postman, etc.)
Experience in Mobile automation testing (Python, Java, Appium, iOS, Android, etc.)
Experience in Web automation testing (Python, Java, Selenium, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Headless, etc.)
Experience in CI/CD process (Github, Jenkins, Gitlab CI, nightly run, etc.)
Experience in Performance and Security testing is a plus.
Have strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Have a proactive and good work relationship with other team members.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Full income tax, social insurance paid by company (Net Salary)
13th month of salary
100% salary during probation period
Performance bonus up to 96M VND or more in the year
Very attractive salary based on skills and experience
Premium Health Insurance Package
Friendly, flexible, and fun working environment
Company trip, team building, monthly party, etc..
Free office lunch, coffee, tea, and snack bar everyday
Monthly team activity allowance
Great opportunity for career development
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
Overview about Floware
Floware designs, develops, and distributes productivity software  Floware is a leader in building innovative software to transform the way people live, play, work, and learn. Our mission is to create smart solutions that benefit everyone and solve their daily challenges. We were the first in Vietnam to develop an iOS app and our first OS X application SmartDay debuted on the Mac App Store at #5. 
WHY FLOWARE ? 
We challenge ourselves every day to find better solutions and better ways to do things. We ask difficult questions and work together to solve them. We believe in doing the right things as well as doing things right. We value honesty, hard work, integrity, and transparency. We are committed to transforming people’s lives, will you join us today?
Chế độ đãi ngộ
Full income tax, social insurance paid by company (Net Salary)
13th month of salary
100% salary during probation period
Performance bonus up to 96M VND or more in the year
Very attractive salary based on skills and experience
Premium Health Insurance Package
Macbook provided
Friendly, flexible, and fun working environment
Company trip, team building, monthly party, etc..
Free office lunch, coffee, tea, and snack bar everyday
Monthly team activity allowance
Great opportunity for career development
Monday – Friday (8:30 AM – 5:30 PM)

Space T đang tìm kiếm một chuyên gia SEO về website Commerce có thể thực hiện phân tích sâu trên các Trang web để xác định các vấn đề không thân thiện với SEO về Khả năng thu thập thông tin và Khả năng lập chỉ mục.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Site SEO Audit: Kiểm tra cấu trúc của trang web để phân tích các yếu tố kỹ thuật quan trọng quyết định hiệu suất.
Content SEO Audit
Off-page SEO Audit
Kiểm tra tất cả các kỹ thuật SEO tối ưu hóa SEO: Cấu trúc trang web, sơ đồ trang web, url, tốc độ, trạng thái trang, v.v.
Lên kế hoạch và làm việc với các team liên quan trong công ty để tối ưu hoặc sửa lỗi liên quan đến SEO.
Website cần audit: https://spacet.vn và tập trung vào https://spacet.vn/shop     
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Chuyên gia về SEO, đặc biệt trong mảng Thương Mại Điện Tử
Từng làm dự án trên website React/NextJS
Có kinh nghiệm Tối ưu hóa SEO cho trang web React
Có kinh nghiệm làm dự án Thương mại điện tử
Địa điểm làm việc: Linh hoạt (ưu tiên TP.HCM)
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Truly startup spirit. No bureaucracy, no hierarchy. Everyone is a leader here, you have the freedom to pursue and achieve your goals. Huge responsibilities from Day 1. Be the owner of your own learning curve. The possibilities are limitless and depend on you.
Working hour: 9:00 - 18:00, 5 work days per week, 12 annual leave days.
Competitive salary, 13-month salary.
Full salary in probation period
Social insurance, health insurance, and unemployment insurance
You get to work in a very dynamic environment and be part of an international team
Global and friendly working environments
Employee referral bonus: 10,000,000.
Salary review once per year.

Về chúng tôi
Space T is an all-in-one interior platform, offering community / construction / e-commerce and making it easy and affordable for homeowners.
Space T is on a mission to innovate space (Home, etc.) with technology and there are a number of existing problems to be solved through technology in the interior industry
Space T is made up of a bunch of creatives, entrepreneurs and tech-driven individuals. We are the combination of space innovation and technology, at the forefront of revolutionising how people design the home of their dreams and above all, to achieve it. Space T was founded 3 years ago; it has grown to thousands of homeowners and received funding from Korea’s No.1 internet company. 
You will be joining a young startup in a growth phase. Building a strong team is key in our ambition to thrive as a company, as co-workers, and as individuals. Therefore, we are looking for someone similarly dedicated and passionate, willing to put their best foot forward (go all stakes in) and take pride in what they do, because we do too.
Chế độ đãi ngộ
Competitive salary & 13th salary
Global and friendly working environments
Only work from Monday to Friday (9am to 6pm)
Macbook provided
Great allowance (Parking, coffee, drinks, etc.)
Insurances (Social, health & unemployment insurances)
12 paid vacation days per year (additional 1 day per 1 year of service)
Team activities (Workshop, outing, dinner, etc.), coffee, snacks, instant noodles
Chance to become a leader at a dynamic and fast-growing company

Project referral bonus: 2% construction contract
Annual performance review

mo_ta_cong_viec:
We are seeking an experienced and results-driven Mid-level/Senior Project Coordinator with at least 3-5 years of experience to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing the successful implementation of projects, ensuring they are delivered within scope, timeline, and budget. 
The ideal candidate will have a strong background in project management, excellent communication skills, and a proven ability to work with cross-functional teams. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the growth and success of our product, SimpleMDG, by driving the successful execution of implementation projects.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Project Planning: Collaborate with stakeholders to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, resource requirements, and risk mitigation strategies.
Project Execution: Lead cross-functional project teams in executing project plans. Monitor project progress, identify and resolve issues, and ensure adherence to project milestones and deadlines.
Stakeholder Management: Establish and maintain effective relationships with internal and external stakeholders. Communicate project updates, risks, and issues in a clear and timely manner. Address stakeholder concerns and manage expectations throughout the project lifecycle.
Resource Management: Allocate and manage project resources efficiently, ensuring optimal utilization. Collaborate with team members and functional managers to secure necessary resources for project activities.
Risk Management: Identify project risks and develop risk mitigation strategies. Proactively monitor and manage risks throughout the project lifecycle, implementing contingency plans as needed.
Quality Assurance: Develop and implement quality assurance processes to ensure project deliverables meet established standards. Conduct regular project reviews and audits to identify areas for improvement and ensure project success.
Reporting and Documentation: Prepare and present project status reports to stakeholders, providing updates on project progress, milestones, risks, and issues. Maintain accurate and up-to-date project documentation, including project plans, schedules, and change requests.
Continuous Improvement: Identify process improvement opportunities and implement best practices to enhance project management methodologies and drive efficiency.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Strong fluency in English is a must, Japanese is a plus
The ability to work in the evening or early morning base on the project
Education: Bachelor's Degree in business administration, information technology, or equivalent experience
Experience: Minimum of 3 years of experience in project management, with a focus on implementing projects. Demonstrated experience managing projects through the entire project lifecycle. In absence of years of experience, certifications or past work may be used to show the level of experience needed to perform at this level.
Project Management Skills: Strong project management skills with a proven ability to deliver projects on time, within budget, and according to scope. Proficient in project management methodologies, tools, and techniques.
Leadership and Communication: Excellent leadership abilities with the capacity to motivate and inspire project teams. Exceptional communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively communicate with stakeholders at all levels.
Quality Assurance: Develop and implement quality assurance processes to ensure project deliverables meet established standards. Conduct regular project reviews and audits to identify areas for improvement and ensure project success.
Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify issues, develop solutions, and make informed decisions.
Professionalism: Maintain a high level of professionalism in all interactions, both internally and externally. This includes exhibiting punctuality, meeting deadlines, and dressing appropriately.
Agile Learning: Demonstrate a willingness to learn new skills and adapt to changing project requirements. Be comfortable working in a fast-paced environment and embrace continuous improvement.
Technical Knowledge: Familiarity with project management software, collaboration tools, Microsoft Office Suite and Atlassian tools.
Industry Knowledge: Basic knowledge of the industry or domain relevant to the organization's projects is preferred.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
15 days of annual leaves
Competitive salary (+13-month salary include)  
Health insurance, social insurance according to the government regulations 
PVI Healthcare Insurance 
Have a chance to work in an international, friendly, open environment  
Annual Travel opportunity
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
Laidon Group is a Certified SAP Silver Partner. We have been delivering solutions to enhance the SAP user experience since 1996.
We specialize in delivering SAP Fiori solutions to provide our customers with the best SAP UX.
We provide the expertise to guide you through your entire Fiori journey together with products to enable the delivery and management of first rate Fiori processes and apps.
Delivering Insight-to-Action KPI
Empowering enterprise users to access relevant tasks and activities on a single point of entry
Reimagine the SAP User Experience
We personalize and simplify the user experience (UX) for your SAP application.
Empower and Engage Enterprise Users with Mobility Solutions
Unleash mobility solutions by building beautiful native SAP Fiori UI’s by taking advantage of iOS and Android device features
Transform Every Touchpoint
Data and processes that will accelerate your SAP Digital Transformation
PRODUCTS AND SOLUTIONS
SAP Fiori
UX for SAP Applications
We personalize and simplify the user experience (UX) for your SAP applications.
ShipERP
Fully-Integrated SAP Multi-Carrier Shipping Solution
We provide organizations with shipping solutions which seamlessly integrate external systems or processes with your SAP system.
Ranorex
Test Automation for GUI Testing
Ranorex is a GUI test automation framework, used for end-to-end testing of web-based, desktop, and mobile applications by capturing and playing back user actions.
SimpleMDG
SAP Cloud Platform master data governance solution
SimpleMDG is an SAP Cloud Platform application for Master Data Governance. It is a cloud solution for centrally maintaining, changing and distributing of master data.
Chế độ đãi ngộ
15 days of annual leave/ 13+ salary bonus
Health insurance and Social Insurance under Government's regulations
Providing customized training courses according to business needs and upon your request
Travel opportunities
Opportunity to training both technical and soft skills to develop your career path
Working time: 08:30 - 18:00 from Monday to Friday

dia_chi: ['Lầu 9, Etown 3, 364 Cộng Hòa, Phường 13, Quận Tân Bình, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
ONE OF THE TOP ICT JAPANESE COMPANIES IN VIETNAM.
NEC Corp is a leader in the integration of IT and network technologies that benefit businesses and people around the world. NEC has more than 50 countries, 289 branches, and 117,418 employees worldwide. Under the company's corporate message of "Orchestrating a brighter world," NEC aims to help solve a wide range of challenging issues and to create new social value for the changing world of tomorrow.
Established in 2006, up to now, NEC Vietnam has grown with more than 200 employees in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. We have been working hard to carry out many social contribution activities to bring more laughter and improve the quality of life.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Play a key role in leading and consulting the development team regarding the architecture and technology choices for the projects.
Lead, mentor and coach developers with best practices including coding standards, design patterns, unit tests, tests, and deployment.
Perform hands-on coding and code review for lower members' levels.
Understand the customer's requirements and business and utilize this knowledge to develop applications.
Stay up to date with the latest web development trends and technologies.
Willing to take business trips or work overseas.
Other assignments from the Manager.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Bachelor’s Degree in Software Engineering or a relevant major.
At least 10 years of experience in Frontend development including 3 years as a Technical Leader/ Technical Architect
Strong experience in Frontend development & Mobile application, using tech stacks like ReactJS, VueJS, Flutter, NextJS, etc.
Backend development experience with Java, .NET, and NodeJS is an advantage.
Experience in building a system from scratch; Knowledge of cloud services such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
Strong experience in reviewing source code and managing a team of developers.
Experience in making specifications such as design and test specifications.
Familiar with software development life cycles such as Waterfall or Agile/Scrum methodologies.
Familiar with Japanese outsourcing/offshore processes.
Good communication in English (Japanese is a big plus)
Willingness to troubleshoot and solve complex problems.
Flexibility to adapt to changing instructions and requirements.
Strong leadership and team-building skills.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Sign-on bonus (1 Month-Salary): Until 31 March 2025
Working time: Mon-Fri, Hybrid working mode (WFH available)
13th Salary + Year-End Reward (a half month) + Excellent Bonus (up to 5 months)
Special allowance for foreign language certificate (up to 500USD/month)
Full social package (SI, HI, UI) with the company, and the law of Vietnam
Annual Health check at the top healthcare center
19 days of paid leave
Free Japanese class; 1:1 class with native teachers
Udemy account provided & Sponsor examination fee for technical certificates such as AWS, Azure, PMP, etc and get the incentive (up to 10M)
Many company activities to tighten the relationship between employees: Company trip, Year-end Event, Team building, Sports Day, Family Day, Outing Trip, etc.
Reward Most Valuable Player (MVP) for individual & team twice a year
Sports clubs provided (100% sponsored by the company): Football, Badminton
Professional environment with clear procedures and well-working facilities
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in Japan, APAC
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
NEC established its liaison office in Vietnam in the early 1990s. In line with its growth strategy, it was re-organized as NEC Vietnam Co., Ltd. in 2006, with a newfound commitment to grow the business and contribute towards the people and society of Vietnam.

A subsidiary of the FPT Group, FPT Software is known as a leading global information technology service provider headquartered in Vietnam. With over 30,000 employees working in 83 offices across 30 countries on five continents, FPT Software consistently delivers the best solutions to more than 1000 clients, including 100 Fortune 500 companies. Placing human resources as the cornerstone of its achievements, employee experience is our top priority in continually creating an innovative, open, and enjoyable work environment for every member.
In 2023, FPT Software officially made its mark on the global billion-dollar company list. This is evidence of the talent and efforts of multiple generations of employees at FPT Software.
Why not explore your potential and embark on a brilliant journey with us?
Trách nhiệm công việc
Develop and maintain high-quality Java applications using Spring/Spring Boot and Struts.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design new features.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.
Work closely with Japanese clients to understand their requirements and deliver solutions that meet their needs.
Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation.

At least 2 years of experience in Java Spring/Spring Boot, Struts development.
Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Knowledgeable in Restful API Services.
Preference will be given to candidates with experience working with Japanese clients and handling documentation.
Experience in document design is a plus.
Proficient in SQL.
Experience with the Waterfall model is a plus.
English proficiency: able to read and understand technical documents.

Must have experience leading a team of at least 5 members.
Experience in supporting team members, reviewing their work, and coding.

Be part of our hugely international environment; we are currently working for Japanese projects, where you can have many opportunities to working overseas.

Awesome social events and parties for employees
We create great teams and take very good care of them
Great opportunity to grow with the company
Frequent staff activities and company parties
Awesome social events and parties for employees

Ngân hàng Woori Việt Nam là ngân hàng có 100% vốn đầu tư của nước ngoài, có mặt lần đầu tiên tại Việt Nam vào năm 1997, cho đến năm 2017 thì thành lập pháp nhân chính thức với tên gọi Ngân hàng TNHH MTV Woori Việt Nam (Ngân hàng Woori Việt Nam), đặt Hội sở tại Hà Nội. Sau khi thành lập pháp nhân, Ngân hàng Woori Việt Nam đã mở rộng mạng lưới kinh doanh, có mặt ở hầu hết các thành phố lớn như Hà Nội, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Đà Nẵng, Cần Thơ,… với 24 chi nhánh và phòng giao dịch trên cả nước.
Tháng 4/2024, Ngân hàng Woori Việt Nam được chấp thuận nâng tổng số vốn điều lệ lên 12.500 tỷ đồng và trở thành Ngân hàng có vốn điều lệ lớn nhất trong hệ thống các ngân hàng nước ngoài tại Việt Nam. Nhằm mang đến những giải pháp tài chính ưu việt cho người dùng, Ngân hàng Woori Việt Nam cung cấp dải sản phẩm đa dạng, linh hoạt, đáp ứng hiệu quả nhu cầu về nguồn vốn, tích lũy, quản lý tài chính của cả khách hàng cá nhân và khách hàng doanh nghiệp. Là Ngân hàng nước ngoài hoạt động tại Việt Nam, chúng tôi luôn bền bỉ học hỏi và đổi mới để thấu hiểu khách hàng, tối ưu sản phẩm, hoàn thiện dịch vụ, nhằm trở thành đối tác tài chính tin cậy của mỗi người dân và doanh nghiệp Việt Nam.

Monitor and issue resolution of both in Production and Integration Environments.
Health and support database services to ensure the highest standards of availability, resilience, integrity, security, tuning and performance.
Support the development team in all database systems integration and troubleshooting issues
Participate to transformation and architecture projects: There will be many architecture improvements and technical challenges, we are going forward on Google Cloud and we are a fast growing IT company.
Understanding data model, business logic and customer data.
Perform SQL tuning and sql query optimization, Linux shell script can be written to execute any database tasks (any linux shell or python, golang script)
Setting up, installing, designing, and architecting database technologies: Oracle (Guard, RAC), PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL and database system monitoring tools
Skilled in consulting on database selection criteria for projects or development teams
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Telco or related field.
Must have 5yrs+ hands on database experience in a similarly challenging position.
Strong DBA experience in production environments and development team support.
Skills in one of databases such as Oracle, MySQL, MS SQL, MongoDB
Expertise in PL/SQL, SQL tuning, ETL, Data Warehousing, Data Lake, CDC Tool as oracle golden gate, Debezium
Excellent communication skills, problem-solving, capable both of teamwork and independently
Accurate, Organized, Detail oriented, Proactive, Caring, Curious.

Về chúng tôi
One Mount Group được thành lập với tham vọng kiến tạo hệ sinh thái công nghệ lớn nhất Việt Nam, cung cấp các giải pháp và dịch vụ xuyên suốt chuỗi giá trị, từ lĩnh vực dịch vụ tài chính, phân phối, bất động sản và bán lẻ. Bắt đầu với VinShop, ứng dụng bán lẻ chuyên dụng giúp các chủ tiệm tạp hoá độc lập phát triển cửa hàng của họ thông qua công nghệ hỗ trợ quản lý chuỗi cung ứng và hàng tồn kho. VinID, siêu ứng dụng và hệ thống quản lý khách hàng thân thiết lớn nhất Việt Nam tích hợp nhiều chức năng như thanh toán, quản lý nhà ở, mua hàng, dịch vụ tài chính. Và OneHousing, nền tảng toàn diện cho mọi nhu cầu về nhà ở, hỗ trợ mua bán, đầu tư và các dịch vụ khác liên quan đến bất động sản.
TẦM NHÌN:
One Mount Group là đơn vị tiên phong, dẫn dắt và truyền cảm hứng để các doanh nghiệp cùng chung tay nâng cao hiệu quả của nền kinh tế Việt Nam, không ngừng cải thiện cuộc sống của mỗi người dân và giúp đánh thức mọi tiềm năng của xã hội.
SỨ MỆNH:
Sứ mệnh của One Mount Group là tạo ra hệ sinh thái đáng tin cậy nhất Việt Nam, kết nối con người và doanh nghiệp tại nơi giao thoa giữa công nghệ và nhân văn.
+3
Chế độ đãi ngộ

dia_chi: ['Tower 2 Times City, 458 Minh Khai, Phường Vĩnh Tuy, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Thành phố Hà Nội']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
We are looking for experienced Senior Backend Engineer (Java) to join our OMC product. This is a fantastic opportunity to work at a well-established and leading start-up in Vietnam as One Mount Group and you will be part of OMC - A digitalized ecosystem via a super App with diverse utilities from retails, E-commerce to Financial services serving people’s end-to-end needs in their daily activities.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Lead team in development area & coach junior members
Develop and maintain server-side application logic
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Contribute to the improvement of the development process
Deliver end-to-end, including unit test, integration test and deployment to PROD
Participate in code reviews & control coding quality standards
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
5+ years of hands on development experience as a Backend Engineer 
Strong knowledge of backend programming languages like Java, Golang and its frameworks (Spring Framework, Spring boot, Gin)
Expertise in Object Oriented Design, Database Design.
Experience with RESTful APIs, Microservices
Experience with ELK ( Elastic Search, Kibana, Logstash … )
Experience with Docker/Kubernetes, Cloud Infrastructure and CICD is a plus
Experience with systems monitoring such as APM, Heap, Profiling. Tools like New Relic, Grafana…
Experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies
Ability to multitask, organize, and prioritize work
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a team
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Salary & Allowances
13-month salary with annual performance bonus, project incentives, sales incentives (based on position)
Lunch allowance: 730.000 VND/month
Special occasion bonus: 2.500.000 - 5.000.000 VND/year
Annual leaves: Up to 20 days/year (based on levels)
Health: Social insurance, PVI premium, yearly health check at Vinmec
Vacation: 3-5 nights at Vinpearl per year (based on levels)
Education: 10% - 30% tuition fee deduction for children at VinSchool (based on levels)
Laptop, screen and other needed facilities/accounts/tools for work
Career Growth
Yearly salary review and promotion
Diverse career path: Management or Expert and functions rotation opportunity
Free learning sources in Udemy, Coursera, O'relly platforms; internal workshop, certification sponsorship, and exclusive mentoring from C-levels
Recognition and awards at team and organizational levels.
Working Environment
Open & collaborative working space foster both individual focus and teamwork activities
Young, dynamic, and collaborative working atmosphere
Unwind zones: gaming, table tennis, yoga, gyms, bath rooms, sleep corner.
Quarterly/yearly teambuilding & engaged internal events
Why You'll Love Working Here
Challenge yourself with high and difficult goals by participating in business models that are unprecedented in the market.
Work in an Agile environment that is extremely flexible and open, eager to incubate any valuable idea.
Work, interact and learn many tech stacks with excellent product development professionals in a variety of large corporations and startups, with the opportunity to receive on-the-job training.
Participate in self-development training courses organized by the company regularly.
Supported by the company to access documents and online training courses.
The product team follows the Scrum Agile model, and each team is considered like a small startup with autonomy, self-determination, and high responsibility for the product.

dia_chi: ['Tower 2 Times City, 458 Minh Khai, Phường Vĩnh Tuy, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Thành phố Hà Nội']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
Trách nhiệm công việc
Work with Product Managers and Designers to implement and design the next generation of products
Architect, build, and test new features
Partner with backend teams to help shape API endpoints
Work with UX teams to deliver important functionality to our flagship application
Be a key member of a team of front end engineers
Maintain excellent coding standards and practices
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Strong Javascript skills (ES6)
Experience in SSR/SSG React-based frameworks, e.g. next.js
Good knowledge of Redux (and ideally Redux-Saga, Redux Toolkit)
Strong understanding of SASS/CSS
Familiarity with CSS-in-JS (styled-components)
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Salary & Allowances
Competitive income with lunch allowance, 13 fixed months salary, performance bonus and gift on special occasion. 
Performance review: twice a year, Annual salary review: once a year
Annual leave: 15 days/year, birthday leave and other leaves/public holidays in accordance with the Labor Law of Vietnam
Periodic medical checkup, Health/Social Insurances & PVI Insurance
Be provided with high performance laptop and screen
Career Growth
Opportunity to experience a great workplace where young & world-class talents work together passionately
Opportunity to promptly boost your capability by solving challenging issues of a big tech ecosystem. It’s worth your try.
Very diverse offline and online seminars & workshop provided by company, supervisors, mentors and buddies
Clear and flexible career path
Be sponsored to study online courses and get certification. 
Working Environment
Modern and flexible Agile Office fully equipped with gaming, yoga, gym, lunch area, personal locker, open space... No dress code, just shine your way.
Learning culture, initiatives and proactive attitude are strongly encouraged at One Mount
Team building, company trip and monthly internal events

dia_chi: ['Tower 2 Times City, 458 Minh Khai, Phường Vĩnh Tuy, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Thành phố Hà Nội']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
As a Product Owner, you will be involved in the software development life cycle with agile methodology from project initiation, implementation, maintenance and post-implementation review phases. You will work with not only the development team but also with in house stakeholders and clients to gather requirements, design workflows, propose product solutions, follow up the whole process of development and guide them how to apply product into their daily operation
Trách nhiệm công việc
Responsibility with stakeholders and clients 
Conduct requirement analysis to ensure the implementation feasibility of functional specifications
Communicate ‘story’ to stakeholders/teams and create business requirement documents and plans
Measure test results with customers’ required outcome
Perform test briefing to the stakeholders and support UAT
Responsibility with development team 
Develop product requirement
Inspect, monitor, and trouble-shoot the solution throughout the deployment process and operations to continuously improve and optimize efficiency
Develop test cases and results and trace to requirements to ensure comprehensive test coverage
Prepare User manuals and training sessions to help users use new features and processes.
Responsibility with management level 
Report to supervisor and line manager about the progress, results, risks, issues in the process of product development 
Sync-up with project management team about the work that product team contribute to the project
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Skill requirement
BA skills 
Requirement elicitation 
Requirement analysis 
Requirement communication 
Product Marketing: Contribute tasks related to product launch (roll out to user groups, locations, etc)
Managing Stakeholders' expectation: Interface with stakeholders (in company and on client side) to understand pain points and gather inputs from data specialists to derive features development and enhancements on the product.
Communication 
Comprehensive and transperant communication in verbal and written form 
Comfortably use professional English to work with stakeholders and clients
Culture-fit requirement
Take ownership and follow up 
Professional in communication and deliverables 
Result and success oriented 
High energy and passionate 
Teamwork spirit & high result oriented
Ambitious and focus on action
Be curious, wiling to learn and get new assignments or projects
Experience requirement
3 - 5+ years of experience as Product Owner or Business Analysis in software product company (REQUIRED)
In-depth understanding of the software production process, the requirements process, and the analysis,design, and implementation process. 
Have experience in writing instructions to use, operating flow/procedures of the system and users.
Having experience in participating in Agile/Scrum projects is an advantage.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Salary & Allowances
13-month salary with annual performance bonus, project incentives, sales incentives (based on position)
Lunch allowance: 730.000 VND/month
Special occasion bonus: 3.500.000 - 5.000.000 VND/year
Annual leaves: Up to 20 days/year (based on levels)
Health: Social insurance, PVI premium, yearly health check at Vinmec
Vacation: 3-5 nights at Vinpearl per year (based on levels)
Education: 10% - 30% tuition fee deduction for children at VinSchool (based on levels)
Laptop, screen and other needed facilities/accounts/tools for work
Career Growth
Yearly salary review and promotion
Diverse career path: Management or Expert and functions rotation opportunity
Free learning sources in Udemy, Coursera, O'relly platforms; internal workshop, certification sponsorship, and exclusive mentoring from C-levels
Recognition and awards at team and organizational levels.
Working Environment
Open & collaborative working space foster both individual focus and teamwork activities
Young, dynamic, and collaborative working atmosphere
Unwind zones: gaming, table tennis, yoga, gyms, bath rooms, sleep corner.
Quarterly/yearly teambuilding & engaged internal events.

dia_chi: ['CJ Building, 2Bis 4-6 Lê Thánh Tôn, Phường Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
About Us:
At CJ OliveNetworks Vina, we drive digital transformation and innovation of space and daily life with our experience and know-how in successfully providing end-to-end IT service based on life and culture. Our mission is contributing to the growth and happiness of our employees and global community by creating customer values through ONLYONE digital experience.
Job Description:
As an ITO Project Leader, you will play a pivotal role in developing and managing our global e-commerce platform and other application systems. You will be responsible for leading projects from inception to completion, ensuring they are delivered with the highest quality standards.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Project Leadership: Lead system integration (SI) and system management (SM) projects, ensuring successful delivery from inception to completion.
System Management: Manage system changes, deployments, and support customers with their technical needs.
Communication: Facilitate effective communication between customers and developers to ensure project requirements are clearly understood and met.
Customer Management: Handle key customer interactions, listen to and address feedback (VOC), analyze and support received tasks, and propose and discover new business opportunities.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Experience:
5+ years of experience in IT development/ operation project management
Experienced in managing collaboration among stakeholders such as customers and Vietnamese developers within the project team.
Experienced in participating as a project manager or project member in IT services for global market.
Experienced in system development/management based on Java, and Spring Framework (preferred).
Experience in building and managing fulfillment processes including OMS and WMS, etc.
Proficient in software testing, including creating test scenarios and test cases, executing tests, and verifying test results.
Skills / Knowledge:
Fluent in business Korean and English (Mid-High Level) with effective communication skills to communicate directly with customers (mandatory).
Strong human resource management skills, including team building, conflict resolution, and performance evaluation.
Strong issue-resolution skills, with the ability to identify and address challenges promptly and effectively.
Proficiency in Java/J2EE, Java Core, JavaScript, HTML5, familiarity with AWS Lambda and related services is essential.
Experience with various Open Databases such as MySQL and OpenSearch.
Experience in building and utilizing Open APIs (preferred).
Willingness to adapt flexibly to changes in clients' requirements and urgent requests is a plus
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Why you'll love working here        
1. Salary and Benefit
Attractive salary and benefits. Competitive Basic Salary; 13th Salary; Lunch, Gasoline and Telephone allowance; Incentive Bonus and annual salary review.
Premium Healthcare for you, 100% covered by the company. Annual medical checking up to USD 5,000 per year.
Full package: Full government social, health and unemployment insurance.
Extra bonus per personal event such as wedding, family’s funeral, birthday, newborn baby, etc.
Paid leave. 12 days per year and 01 day for Company Foundation day, long service leave.
Discount 40% for CJ's brands: CGV Cinema, Tous Les Jours, CJ Food, Meet Master, CJ Market, etc.
2. Working Environment
Working time: Monday – Friday. We work 40 hours per week.
English working environment: Chance to work onsite abroad and work on challenging GDC projects. Work closely with both Vietnamese and Korean experts.
Internal English/ Korean Class: Fully sponsored by the Company after working time.
Company trip and team building, football club, dinner party every month. We love playing teamwork games.
Free snacks, drinks (tea, coffee, etc.).
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
CJ OliveNetworks, a company that creates customer satisfaction and value through lifestyle-based IT services and continuous development of new technology.
Since its foundation in 1995, CJ OliveNetworks has achieved utmost customer satisfaction and value via successful offering of lifestyle based IT services such as manufacturing, distribution, logistics and media, leveraging steady growth of the company with customer trust and support. Based on numerous experiences and capabilities accumulated from building and providing IT systems and services, CJ OliveNetworks answers to needs of the market by leading the development of new technologies which corresponds to latest IT trends including open source, big data, Internet of things(IoT), cloud computing, security, and many others. CJ OliveNetworks promises to grow into a global ICT company through consistent challenges and innovations.

Full package: Full government social, health and unemployment insurance.
Extra bonus per personal event such as wedding, family’s funeral, birthday, newborn baby, etc.

dia_chi: ['CJ Building, 2Bis 4-6 Lê Thánh Tôn, Phường Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
About Us
At CJ OliveNetworks Vina, we drive digital transformation and innovation of space and daily life with our experience and know-how in successfully providing end-to-end IT service based on life and culture. Our mission is contributing to the growth and happiness of our employees and global community by creating customer values through ONLYONE digital experience.
Job Description
As a Java developer, you will be responsible for modernizing legacy systems, implementing new features for our SCM projects, converting .NET systems to Java (with support from the .Net team), delivering new functionalities, and ensuring system stability through automation and maintenance.
Trách nhiệm công việc
As a Senior Java Developer, you will be responsible for modernizing legacy systems, implementing new features for our SCM projects, converting .NET systems to Java (with support from the .Net team), delivering new functionalities, and ensuring system stability through automation and maintenance.
You will have an advantage if you have experience with systems such as:
Warehouse Management System (WMS).
Order Management System (OMS).
Transportation Management System (TMS).
Freight Management System (FMS).
Customer Management System (CMS).
  System Modernization: Convert legacy systems from .NET to Java; upgrade existing features and create new functionalities using data-driven insights.
Feature Development: Develop new features based on requirements from Singapore clients. 
Full Development Lifecycle: Participate in planning meetings, development phases, and deliver scalable, high-quality solutions. 
Automation & Maintenance: Automate maintenance tasks using development tools and ensure system stability.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Java Development: Over 5 years of experience in designing and implementing Java-based solutions using Spring Boot to build Restful applications. 
Enterprise Project Experience: Hands-on experience with technologies such as Java, JSP, Spring Boot, Spring Framework, Spring MVC, JQuery, React.js, Jenkins, MyBatis, and Git. 
Database Management: Proficient in databases such as MSSQL Server, MySQL, DB2, Oracle SQL, MongoDB, including query writing, stored procedures, functions, index management, and performance optimization. 
Familiarity with debugging and performance tuning, along with a solid understanding of deploying, maintaining, and monitoring complex Java Web applications. 
Strong object-oriented analysis and design skills, understanding of design patterns and concepts. 
Ability to maintain, troubleshoot, fix issues, and update OSS security patches. 
Experience with open-source solutions and applying new technology skills to existing systems.
Core Competencies 
Communication, problem-solving, and time management skills. 
Ability to work effectively in teams and independently across multiple projects.

Internal English/ Korean Class: Fully sponsored by the Company after working time.
Company trip and team building, football club, dinner party every month. We love playing teamwork games.
Free snacks, drinks (tea, coffee, etc.).

ten_cong_ty: Công Ty Cổ Phần Giải Pháp Và Công Nghệ Vietnix
dia_chi: ['265 Hồng Lạc, Phường 10, Quận Tân Bình, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh']
quy_trinh_phong_van: ['Vòng 1: Screen CV', 'Vòng 2: Phỏng vấn trực tiếp với Tech Lead']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
Trách nhiệm công việc
Tính chất công việc: Theo ca được phân công. Ngày 3 ca làm việc: 8h00’ - 16h00’, 16h00’ - 24h00’, 00h00’ - 8h00’.
Chịu trách nhiệm hỗ trợ khắc phục sự cố cho khách hàng.
Quản trị hệ thống Hosting Cpanel, DirectAdmin, aaPanel.
Quản trị máy chủ trên hệ điều hành Linux, Windows Server.
Quản trị các máy ảo trên nền ảo hóa Type 1 như Proxmox, VMware ESXi.
Quản trị hệ thống firewall chống tấn công DoS/DDoS.
Quản trị hệ thống Web Server, Mail Server.
Tham gia phát triển các công nghệ/công cụ phục vụ cho công việc, các dự án về triển khai và quản trị hệ thống theo yêu cầu.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Độ tuổi: < 25 tuổi
Tốt nghiệp đại học/cao đẳng hoặc sinh viên năm cuối chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Mạng máy tính, An ninh mạng, Quản trị hệ thống (kèm theo bảng điểm).
Sử dụng thành thạo hệ điều hành Linux.
Có chứng chỉ LPI 1, LPI 2 hoặc có kiến thức tương đương LPI 1, LPI 2.
Có chứng chỉ CCNA hoặc có kiến thức tương đương CCNA.
Am hiểu về các services như Apache, Nginx, Mysql, Php, SQL Server.
Nắm vững 1 ngôn ngữ lập trình bất kỳ (bash, python, php,..).
Năng động, có trách nhiệm với công việc.
Giao tiếp tốt, trung thực, phát âm rõ ràng.
Nhiệt tình, nhanh nhạy trong công việc, có khả năng chịu được áp lực công việc.
Có khả năng nghiên cứu độc lập, đọc hiểu tài liệu tiếng Anh tốt.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Lương cơ bản: 8 triệu đến 10 triệu.
Được hưởng các quyền lợi theo chính sách của công ty và quy định của nhà nước.
Review lương 2 lần/năm (tùy vào năng lực), lương tháng 13, cùng nhiều chế độ thưởng khác nhau.
Team building 2 lần/năm.
Có cơ hội tham gia các khóa đào tạo, phát triển, nâng cao năng lực làm việc.
Làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, năng động, nhiều cơ hội phát triển năng lực bản thân, đãi ngộ dựa trên năng lực và sự nhiệt tình sáng tạo của từng thành viên.
Nghỉ 12 ngày phép năm và các ngày lễ tết, dịp đặc biệt của công ty.
Hỗ trợ ăn trưa, gửi xe.
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
Công ty Cổ phần giải pháp và Công nghệ Vietnix
Thành lập từ năm 2012, Vietnix đã trải qua gần 10 năm xây dựng và phát triển trong lĩnh vực Hosting. Vietnix là dịch vụ máy chủ đầu tiên tại Việt Nam tập trung phát triển công nghệ chống DDoS chuyên nghiệp.
Vietnix là công ty tin học trẻ chuyên nghiệp trong lĩnh vực hệ thống máy chủ, cho thuê hosting, máy chủ ảo (VPS), máy chủ vật lý, dịch vụ quản trị máy chủ, dịch vụ bảo mật máy chủ. Với đội ngũ kỹ sư lành nghề và tận tâm, Vietnix luôn cam kết mang lại dịch vụ ổn định và chất lượng nhất cho khách hàng.
Uy tín - Chất lượng - Hiệu quả
Cho đến thời điểm hiện tại, đã có hơn 50.000 khách hàng tin tưởng sử dụng dịch vụ của Vietnix, trong đó có các khách hàng lớn như GTV, Vietnamworks, UB Group...
Với đội ngũ hơn 60 nhân sự chuyên nghiệp luôn sẵn sàng phục vụ, Vietnix cam kết đem đến cho khách hàng và đối tác sự hài lòng nhất.
DỊCH VỤ CỦA VIETNIX CÓ GÌ TỐT?
1. HẠ TẦNG MẠNH MẼ
Cơ sở hạ tầng vững mạnh
Hệ thống ổn định được thiết kế dự phòng nhiều lớp, phần cứng được lựa chọn tối ưu. Tính năng giám sát và cảnh báo toàn diện giúp hỗ trợ khách hàng trong mọi tình huống.
2. ĐỘI NGŨ KỸ THUẬT CAO
Kinh nghiệm & tận tâm
Đội ngũ kỹ thuật có trình độ chuyên môn cao và kinh nghiệm dày dặn luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ, giải đáp các thắc mắc giúp mang đến cho khách hàng trải nghiệm dịch vụ tốt nhất.
3. TỰ CHỦ CÔNG NGHỆ
Firewall chống tấn công DDoS
Công nghệ Firewall Anti DDoS được Vietnix phát triển từ năm 2012 với nhiều tính năng vượt trội: Phát hiện và ngăn chặn tấn công tự động, tùy biến rule linh hoạt theo từng ứng dụng, tối ưu hóa chống lại các cuộc tấn công ở thị trường Việt Nam.
4. KÊNH HỖ TRỢ 24/7
Phản hồi nhanh chóng
Đội ngũ hỗ trợ và hệ thống giám sát hoạt động 24/7 giúp phát hiện nhanh các sự cố, phản hồi nhanh chóng, đảm bảo dịch vụ của khách hàng vận hành xuyên suốt và ổn định.
5. CHÍNH SÁCH RÕ RÀNG
Thông tin chi tiết minh bạch
Tất cả các thông tin liên quan đến điều khoản và chính sách của Vietnix có nội dung thể hiện đầy đủ, chi tiết và được công khai trên trang chủ giúp cho khách hàng có được sự an tâm tuyệt đối.
6. NHIỀU CHƯƠNG TRÌNH ƯU ĐÃI
Tiết kiệm chi phí
Vietnix thường xuyên có nhiều chương trình ưu đãi hấp dẫn nhằm tri ân khách hàng cũ cũng như giúp khách hàng mới có cơ hội trải nghiệm dịch vụ chất lượng cao với mức giá tốt nhất.
+2
Chế độ đãi ngộ
Lương tháng 13
Xét tăng lương 2 lần/năm (tùy vào năng lực)
Nhiều chế độ thưởng khác nhau
Được hưởng các quyền lợi theo chính sách của công ty và quy định của nhà nước
Nghỉ 12 ngày phép năm và các ngày lễ tết, dịp đặc biệt của công ty.
Teambuilding 2 lần/năm, nghỉ các ngày lễ tết, dịp đặc biệt của công ty.
Được học hỏi, đào tạo luôn không ngừng phát triển với nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến bản thân, phát triển lên các vị trí cao hơn trong hệ thống tổ chức.
CLB thể thao
Làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, năng động, nhiều cơ hội phát triển năng lực bản thân, đãi ngộ dựa trên năng lực và sự nhiệt tình sáng tạo của từng thành viên.
Hỗ trợ ăn trưa, gửi xe.

dia_chi: ['Phòng 301 và 101, Số nhà 03 Lê Văn Hưu, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Thành phố Hà Nội']
quy_trinh_phong_van: ['Vòng 1: Interview with Tech Lead', 'Vòng 2: Dealing']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
EAERA is a fintech company, launched in Vietnam in 2017 with an aim of making trading in various assets easy and accessible to everyone.
We reinvent how trading and investing work by creating exceptional products people love, a next generation of financial trading platform.
The startup offers equity, cryptocurrency, and options trading platform, as well as cash management accounts that democratize access to the financial markets and aims to make people comfortable storing money and trading stocks using its application.
----
EAERA technology team is looking for hands-on developers to advance our architectural strategies and innovation efforts. Ideal candidates are someone who are tech-savvy and passionate to learn and adopt new technologies, understand web development technology stack, emerging web standards and are able to turn concepts into life. The selected individuals will be part of a talented engineering team working in a fast-paced and outcome focused environment.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Design and develop compelling and usable customer web interfaces using VueJS.
Work closely with engineers from other teams to develop and build high-quality software.
Improve the efficiency of existing products, debug and troubleshoot production issues.
Build the architecture and design of new products and features.
Implement UI components and libraries.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Must Haves:
Utilize code versioning tools (Git).
Experienced with working on Linux based infrastructure.
Expert knowledge with HTML5, CSS3, SASS/SCSS.
Expert with developing responsive layouts leveraging CSS and media queries.
Solid knowledge of modern web development technologies & front-end frameworks.
Proficient in Vue stack (Vue 2/3, Vuex/Pinia, Vue Router) or similar stack (React, Angular…)
Nice to Have:
Experience in Mobile App development (build cross platform apps using Javascript).
Know how to debug, measure and optimize the performance of web applications.
Understand and be able to implement good tests for front-end code.
Basic understanding of server, database, and good experience in RESTful API design and development.
Desired soft skills:
Awareness of critical concepts in DevOps and Agile principles.
Ability to grasp technical and financial concepts quickly.
Easily adapt and learn new things.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Ability to work under pressure and handle emergency situations effectively.
Good problem-solving skills.
Attention to detail. 
Qualifications:
At least 2 years' experience working on VueJS or similar stacks.
Intermediate level of comprehension of the English language
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
PVI Insurance package.
A 13rd month salary as an end-of-year bonus.
14-15th month depends on performance bonus.
Annual performance review for salary and career development.
Excellent environment for self-improvement with technical trainings and seminars monthly.
Attractive remuneration package.
Excellent working environment with young, energetic and international, multi-culture teammates.
Strong career development opportunity with growth within the company and the fintech industry.
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
EAERA is a fintech company, launched in Vietnam in 2017 with an aim of making trading in various assets easy and accessible to everyone.
We reinvent how trading and investing work by creating exceptional products people love, a next generation of financial trading platform.
The startup offers equity, cryptocurrency, and options trading platform, as well as cash management accounts that democratizes access to the financial markets and aims to make people comfortable storing money and trading stocks using its application.
+4

Excellent environment for self-improvement with technical trainings and seminars monthly

mo_ta_cong_viec:
Trách nhiệm công việc
Thiết kế, phát triển và bảo trì giao diện người dùng (UI) và trải nghiệm người dùng (UX) cho các ứng dụng web và di động.
Hợp tác chặt chẽ với nhóm sản phẩm và thiết kế để hiểu rõ yêu cầu và chuyển đổi chúng thành các giải pháp front-end hiệu quả.
Viết mã HTML, CSS và JavaScript chất lượng cao, tuân thủ các nguyên tắc và đạt hiệu quả tốt nhất.
Tích hợp các frameworks và công cụ front-end hiện đại để nâng cao hiệu quả và hiệu suất của ứng dụng.
Thực hiện các bài kiểm tra và tích hợp để đảm bảo chất lượng và tính ổn định của mã code.
Theo dõi và cập nhật các xu hướng và công nghệ front-end mới nhất.
Tổng hợp và phân tích dữ liệu, quy trình và mã để khắc phục sự cố và xác định các lĩnh vực cần cải thiện.
Áp dụng các công nghệ tiên tiến để cải thiện và phát triển các ứng dụng cũ.
Thu thập và giải quyết các yêu cầu kỹ thuật và thiết kế giao diện.
Phối hợp các thành viên trong nhóm hoàn thành công việc.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Tối thiểu 4 năm kinh nghiệm thực tế trong lĩnh vực phát triển Front-end & Backend.
Có kiến thức chuyên môn sâu rộng về HTML, CSS và JavaScript, Angular, VueJS, PHP, Go, Phython, NodeJS, .Net, MongoDB
Có khả năng viết mã chất lượng cao, dễ hiểu và dễ bảo trì.
Hiểu biết về các nguyên tắc thiết kế UI/UX và có khả năng áp dụng chúng vào thực tế.
Có kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề và tư duy logic tốt.
Kỹ năng giao tiếp và làm việc nhóm hiệu quả.
Có tinh thần ham học hỏi và luôn cập nhật các xu hướng công nghệ mới nhất.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Công ty hỗ trợ chi phí làm Visa.
Làm việc trong môi trường quốc tế, năng động, chuyên nghiệp, có nhiều cơ hội để phát triển nghề nghiệp.
Tài trợ chi phí ăn uống và nhà cửa.
Lương 2,200$ hoặc thỏa thuận.
ĐỊA ĐIỂM LÀM VIỆC
Bangkok, Thailand.
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
Công Ty Gem Multimedia SDN. BHD là công ty chuyên cung cấp dịch vụ tư vấn chiến lược Digital Marketing, tư vấn định hướng Marketing và định hướng Social Marketing nhằm giúp Doanh nghiệp tối ưu những chiến lược mà Doanh nghiệp đang chạy hoặc chuẩn bị chạy (SEO, Google Ads, Social Ads,…). Chúng tôi luôn phân tích trước khi đưa ra các kế hoạch và chiến lược phù hợp dựa trên định hướng, tài nguyên hiện hữu và nhân lực của từng khách hàng.
Chế độ đãi ngộ
Mức lương và thưởng cạnh tranh.
Làm việc trong môi trường quốc tế, năng động, chuyên nghiệp, có nhiều cơ hội để phát triển nghề nghiệp.
Công ty hỗ trợ toàn bộ chi phí Visa
Các khóa đào tạo nội bộ về Kỹ thuật & Kỹ năng mềm
Nhiều hoạt động của công ty (Đại hội thể thao và âm nhạc, giải TMA Futsal…) được tổ chức hàng năm.
Bảo hiểm chăm sóc sức khoẻ toàn diện.
Tài trợ chi phí ăn uống và nhà cửa.
Thời gian làm việc: Giờ hành chính từ thứ 2 đến sáng thứ 7.

mo_ta_cong_viec:
Trách nhiệm công việc
Be involved in Technical Team, and work together with the Web team and also the Mobile team. 
Responsible for building up the system, architecture design, database design, and technology solutions for the project.  
Review code, and review solutions for the project.  
Solving technical issues, and developing workarounds and alternative solutions.  
Support, train, and build programmer's skill in the company.  
Continuously research, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
5+ years of experience in the analysis, design, and development of large-scale software solutions with ReactJS and NodeJs.  
Deeply understand Javascript and had experience in Front-end & Back-end frameworks 
Strong understanding and experience of:
Knowledge well in design patterns; 
Clean code, coding standards, and code reviews & code refactoring;
Unit tests, mocking libraries, code coverage; 
Can lead technical support and training;
Detail-oriented and goal-driven person. 
Having any of the below experience/knowledge is a plus: 
SSO & Microservice architecture
GraphQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, ElasticSearch
K8s, Docker
System monitoring, TimeSeries Database (e.g. StatsD, InfluxDB, Graphite…) 
CI/CD with Gitlab, Azure DevOps, Bamboo, Bitbucket or similar tools
Cloud services (GCP, AWS, or Microsoft Azure...)
Good at English, ability to read & understand the English document, ability to communicate fluently
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Well-trained and dedicated to being able to catch the pace smoothly
Attracted salary based on the ability of the candidate and the general salary framework set by the company.
Salary review based on performance every 6 months if your basic salary is less than 30,000,000 VND. If your basic salary is from 30,000,000 VND, it will be reviewed every year
13th-month salary and bonus for holidays
Team building once a month
Company trip: 1 time/year
PVI Healthcare Insurance
Full social benefits in accordance with the company and the law of Vietnam
Great opportunity to improve your English
Opportunity to be trained overseas, and develop English communication skill.
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
CyberLogitec Vietnam is an ODC (Off-shore Development Center) in Vietnam providing outsourcing service for SW Development, Testing and 24/7 Service Desk.
We specialize in IT solutions for logistics business such as shipping, terminal & yard, warehouse, trucking and forwarding. Also we are researching new technologies for web, mobile, virtual reality and machine learning.
We have lots of industrial experiences for more than 10 years in logistics business and technology area, and we are providing our service for our global customers in more than 10 countries such as Korea, USA, Thailand, China, Saudi Arabia, Turkey, UAE, Malaysia, India, Japan, Brazil and Singapore.
Our top priority is creating customers’ value with high quality and global standard outsourcing service.
Chế độ đãi ngộ
Well trained and dedicated to being able to catch the pace smoothly.
Attracted salary based on the ability
Salary review every 6 months based on the work performance
13th-month salary and bonus for holidays
PVI Healthcare Insurance
Full social benefits in accordance with company policy and Vietnamese Law
Company trip once a year
Team building once a month
Great opportunity to improve English
Opportunity to learn Logistics and professional management system of project development process

thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
Là Chuyên gia Chuyển đổi Kỹ thuật số (DX) và Đối tác tăng trưởng kỹ thuật số, chúng tôi cống hiến các kỹ năng DX của mình để giúp các khách hàng lớn đạt được thành công. 
LG CNS dẫn đầu công nghệ Cloud, AI/Big data, smart factory, smart logistics, smart city, blockchain, và các công nghệ chuyển đổi số khác

Lương sẽ được thảo luận sau khi thông qua CV & Phỏng vấn

dia_chi: ['CJ Building, 2Bis 4-6 Lê Thánh Tôn, Phường Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
About Us
At CJ OliveNetworks Vina, we drive digital transformation and innovation of space and daily life with our experience and know-how in successfully providing end-to-end IT service based on life and culture. Our mission is contributing to the growth and happiness of our employees and global community by creating customer values through ONLYONE digital experience.
Job Description
As a Shopify Senior developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining eCommerce sites on the Shopify platform. This role involves collaborating with various teams, troubleshooting issues, and continuously improving our Shopify-based products and processes.
Trách nhiệm công việc
As a Shopify Senior developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining eCommerce sites on the Shopify platform. This role involves collaborating with various teams, troubleshooting issues, and continuously improving our Shopify-based products and processes. 
Develop and maintain eCommerce sites on the Shopify platform, including themes, Liquid programming, and corresponding apps.
Extend Shopify platforms through the installation and setup of apps, integrating them into the customer experience.
Provide support to non-technical teams in the use of Shopify and its apps effectively.
Evaluate new technologies to improve products and processes, and contribute to internal projects related to Shopify.
Identify areas for site improvement, troubleshoot, and solve bugs as they arise.
Train other developers in app development skills.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
4+ years of experience working with Shopify.
At least 7+ years of experience: Developing websites using PHP, and relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL...) is a plus.
Complete know-how of Shopify’s Admin System.
Strong programming knowledge of “Liquid” for Shopify Stores and Shopify Themes. Proficiency in HTML5 and CSS3 is also required.
Knowledge of PHP scripting language for building Shopify Apps, and familiarity with JSON REST API with Auth.
Proficiency in front-end development technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS.
Knowledge of Google Analytics for Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) is desirable. Expertise in Google Content Experiments is required for testing purposes.
Demonstrated strong understanding of at least one modern JS framework/library: ReactJS, VueJS, NextJS, AngularJS, etc.
Fluent in business English with effective communication skills to interact with customers.
Strong interpersonal skills: Ability to interact with stakeholders from multiple teams effectively.
Willingness to adapt flexibly to changes in clients' requirements and urgent requests.
Strong team building, conflict resolution, and performance evaluation skills.
Strong issue-resolution skills: Ability to identify and address challenges promptly and effectively.
Optional Requirements:
Expertise in creating web designs and user interfaces (UI).
Proficiency in developing payment gateways and inventories.
Knowledge of other popular eCommerce platforms such as Magento, WooCommerce, and BigCommerce.
Ability to code review and mentor junior/mid developers.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
1. Salary and Benefit
Attractive salary and benefits. Competitive Basic Salary; 13th Salary; Lunch, Gasoline and Telephone allowance; Incentive Bonus and annual salary review.
Premium Healthcare for you, 100% covered by the company. Annual medical checking up to USD 5,000 per year.
Full package: Full government social, health and unemployment insurance.
Extra bonus per personal event such as wedding, family’s funeral, birthday, newborn baby, etc.
Paid leave. 12 days per year and 01 day for Company Foundation day, long service leave.
Discount 40% for CJ's brands: CGV Cinema, Tous Les Jours, CJ Food, Meet Master, CJ Market, etc.
2. Working Environment
Working time: Monday – Friday. We work 40 hours per week.
English working environment: Chance to work onsite abroad and work on challenging GDC projects. Work closely with both Vietnamese and Korean experts.
Internal English/ Korean Class: Fully sponsored by the Company after working time.
Company trip and team building, football club, dinner party every month. We love playing teamwork games.
Free snacks, drinks (tea, coffee, etc.).
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
CJ OliveNetworks, a company that creates customer satisfaction and value through lifestyle-based IT services and continuous development of new technology.
Since its foundation in 1995, CJ OliveNetworks has achieved utmost customer satisfaction and value via successful offering of lifestyle based IT services such as manufacturing, distribution, logistics and media, leveraging steady growth of the company with customer trust and support. Based on numerous experiences and capabilities accumulated from building and providing IT systems and services, CJ OliveNetworks answers to needs of the market by leading the development of new technologies which corresponds to latest IT trends including open source, big data, Internet of things(IoT), cloud computing, security, and many others. CJ OliveNetworks promises to grow into a global ICT company through consistent challenges and innovations.
Chế độ đãi ngộ
1.   Salary and Benefit
Attractive salary and benefits. Competitive Basic Salary; 13th Salary; Lunch, Gasoline and Telephone allowance; Incentive Bonus and annual salary review.
Premium Healthcare for you, 100% covered by the company. Annual medical checking up to USD 5,000 per year.
Full package: Full government social, health and unemployment insurance.
Extra bonus per personal event such as wedding, family’s funeral, birthday, newborn baby, etc.
Paid leave. 12 days per year and 01 day for Company Foundation day, long service leave.
Discount 40% for CJ's brands: CGV Cinema, Tous Les Jours, CJ Food, Meet Master, CJ Market, etc.
2.  Working Environment
Working time: Monday – Friday. We work 40 hours per week.
English working environment: Chance to work onsite abroad and work on challenging GDC projects. Work closely with both Vietnamese and Korean experts.
Internal English/ Korean Class: Fully sponsored by the Company after working time.
Company trip and team building, football club, dinner party every month. We love playing teamwork games.
Free snacks, drinks (tea, coffee, etc.).

mo_ta_cong_viec:
As a proud member of Galaxy Holdings - Sovico Group, Galaxy Technology stands as a dynamic force in the digital realm, recognized for our prowess in talent and customizable solutions. We are dedicated to propelling businesses worldwide to new heights through cuttingedge digital, software, and IT solutions. Across diverse industries, including Aviation, EAI, Fintech, Manufacturing, Automotive, Blockchain, Medical, Health Tech, Real Estate, Hospitality, Education, and beyond, we serve as a strategic partner, empowering organizations with innovation and excellence.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Participated in designing, building, and deploying back-end API services with Node.js. 
Integrate with front-end applications. 
Complete the assignments according to schedule. 
Continuously optimize and upgrade source code to ensure quality, stability, and safety. 
Proactive in researching and applying new technologies. 
Support and coordinate with other functions and departments.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
At least 4 years of experience developing back-end Node.js. 
Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, and have a knowledge of Nest.js. 
Good working experience with Source/Version Control tools such as Git. 
Have experiences with NoSQL – MongoDB. 
High sense of responsibility, communication skills, and team spirit.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Attractive income.
Pay your full salary in two months of probation.
Review salary once per year.
12 days of annual leave.
Year-end bonus/ performance bonus based on the business performance.
Birthday gift: 1.000.000 VND
Social, Health and others Insurance are based on Labor Law and Health insurance PVI.
Activities: Company Trip, Year End Party, Sport (football, badminton, running club…), Christmas, Charity activities, …
Good work environment and working in a professional, friendly, well-equipped environment.
Chances to work in a big and global team, work directly with customers.

quy_trinh_phong_van: ['Vòng 1: Interview with Hiring Managers']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
ONE OF THE TOP ICT JAPANESE COMPANIES IN VIETNAM.
NEC Corp is a leader in the integration of IT and network technologies that benefit businesses and people around the world. NEC has more than 50 countries, 289 branches, and 117,418 employees worldwide. Under the company's corporate message of "Orchestrating a brighter world," NEC aims to help solve a wide range of challenging issues and to create new social value for the changing world of tomorrow.
Established in 2006, up to now, NEC Vietnam has grown with more than 200 employees in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. We have been working hard to carry out many social contribution activities to bring more laughter and improve the quality of life.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Lead and manage the team of developers to ensure successful delivery of projects in timeline & quality.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze the project scope and objectives.
Monitor project progress, project estimation, identify potential risks or issues.
Provide technical expertise and guidance to the development team, assisting with complex problem-solving and ensuring high-quality deliverables. 
Negotiate & provide advice or propose new features or functions for customers. 
Measure, establish, and manage project schedules and work plans to ensure all parties meet project requirements, deadlines, budgets, and goals.
Other assignments from the Manager. 
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Bachelor’s Degree in IT or a relevant major.
From 5 years of experience in software development and at least 2 years in project management as a Project Leader/ Team Leader/ BrSE
Experience in the estimation, and implementation of complex projects, Resource management, Risk/Issue management, Progress management, etc.
Hands-on experience in technologies such as Java/ .Net/ VueJS/ ReactJS, etc.
Solid in SQL/non-SQL databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc. 
Familiar with software development life cycle both Waterfall and Agile methodology.
Experience in making specifications such as design (Basic Design, Detail Design, or Function Design) and test specifications.
Willingness to troubleshoot and solve complex problems.
Good at Japanese (JLPT N3+) & Basic in English
Leadership skills and Motivated team members.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Sign-On Bonus (1-month salary): Available until March 31, 2025.
Working time: Mon-Fri, Hybrid working mode (WFH available)
13th Salary + Year-End Reward (a half month) + Excellent Bonus (up to 5 months)
Special allowance for foreign language certificate (up to 500USD/month)
Full social package (SI, HI, UI) with the company, and the law of Vietnam
Annual Health check at the top healthcare center
19 days of paid leave
Free Japanese class; 1:1 class with native teachers
Udemy account provided & Sponsor examination fee for technical certificates such as AWS, Azure, PMP, etc and get the incentive (up to 10M)
Many company activities to tighten the relationship between employees: Company trip, Year-end Event, Team building, Sports Day, Family Day, Outing Trip, etc.
Reward Most Valuable Player (MVP) for individual & team twice a year
Sports clubs provided (100% sponsored by the company): Football, Badminton
Professional environment with clear procedures and well-working facilities
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in Japan, APAC
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
NEC established its liaison office in Vietnam in the early 1990s. In line with its growth strategy, it was re-organized as NEC Vietnam Co., Ltd. in 2006, with a newfound commitment to grow the business and contribute towards the people and society of Vietnam.
In a rapidly changing business environment, we have evolved to be a comprehensive solution provider, to deliver on our core strengths of providing Solutions for Society, which involves providing social infrastructure benefiting citizens and communities.
Today, we are highly dependent on ICT technologies. We are proud to say that NEC is well-positioned to meet the needs of the market, to have the relevant technologies in-house, and is ready to deliver.
We provide Solutions & Services, including:
1./ Software development (Offshore) for many clients from Japan & APAC Region (Singapore, Malaysia, etc.).
2./ System integrator in the field of:
Telecom Carrier Industry
Retail Industry
Manufacturing Industry
Food and Beverage Industry
Public Sector (Biometrics on Vietnam National ID, Satellite LOTUSat-1)
3./ Integrate with own and/or partner solutions.
4./ Face Recognition Solution “Smart Face Authentication”.
Refer to https://www.facebook.com/NECVietnam.page for new chances and do not hesitate to apply to NEC VietNam.
+2
Chế độ đãi ngộ
Working time: Mon-Fri, Hybrid working mode (WFH available)
13th Salary + Year-End Reward (a half month) + Excellent Bonus
Special allowance for foreign language certificate (up to 500USD/month)
Full social package (SI, HI, UI) & Premium healthcare insurance (Aon)
Annual Health Check at the top healthcare center
Up to 19 days of paid leave
Free Japanese class; 1:1 class with native teachers
Udemy account provided & Sponsor examination fee for technical certificates such as AWS, Azure, PMP, etc and get the incentive (up to 10M)
Many company activities to tighten the relationship between employees: Company trip, Year-end Event, Team building, Sports Day, Family Day, Outing Trip, etc.
Reward Most Valuable Player (MVP) for individual & team twice a year
Sport clubs provided (100% sponsored by company): Football, Badminton
Professional environment with clear procedures and good working facilities
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in Japan, and APAC.

mo_ta_cong_viec:
Be a part of EFL Global!
EFL is a leading global supply chain solutions provider headquartered in Sri Lanka and backed by a global network across 70+ offices in 39 countries throughout Asia, Africa, Middle East, Europe Canada and USA. While offering an extensive range of supply chain solutions including freight, 3PL and inland transportation, EFL embraces an innovative approach to logistics by using digital technologies to create new age business processes and customer experiences. 
As a progressive organization that continues to expand via digital transformation, we are looking for dynamic individuals who strive to pursue a career at EFL Global- Vietnam within a rapidly growing business environment.  
Trách nhiệm công việc
Install, configure and maintain overall policies
Manage daily operations of IT infrastructure including servers and network.
Check performance/operation status of servers, network devices, security system.
Requests create / remove Account (email & ERP system) for new staff/ leavers.
Manage software license and update.
Provide daily support to end users on a variety of issues (internet, email, applications, printing....)
Identify, research and resolve IT technical problems.
Monitor and troubleshoot hardware and software problems.
Set-up, configure laptop/PCs for new staff (installation of relevant software, printers....)
Support to technically manage office equipment (printers, projectors, copy machines, telephone operator...).
Assist on data extraction on ERP system, creating & scheduling of reports
Other tasks assigned by management.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
At least 2 years of working experience in IT admin, network support…
Good knowledge about network infrastructure & network devices (Cisco, Pep link, Fortinet)
Strong knowledge about Office 365 products (Outlook, SharePoint, Power Automate)
Knowledge of ERP software’s will be an added advantage
Good English (both oral and written).
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Social/Health Insurance
Travel
Bonus & Award
Training
Increments
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi

EFL is a leading global supply chain solutions provider headquartered in Sri Lanka and backed by a global network across 70+ offices in 39 countries throughout Asia, Africa, Middle East, Europe Canada and USA.
